EmailTemplate.subject: It’s time for a new point of view on smart cities

View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Blog Build a smart city platform that enables endless possibilities The smart city movement is well under way. But most smart city applications still address isolated problems. It’s time to create an adaptable and intelligent platform that will help cities realize the promise of technology in a holistic way. Read our blog <[[https://www.nokia.com/blog/time-right-different-point-view-smart-cities/?did=d00000000188&utm_campaign=city_as_a_platform&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email1:suparno-blog&utm_term=smartcity]]> to learn how the Nokia Bell Labs Future X for industries architecture makes this city as a platform possible and brings the possibilities of technology within reach. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
